dmca.title: Massive Number of DMCA Violations on www.Gamerzplanet.net
dmca.body:
From: Jeff Morris [mailto:Jeff.Morris@epicgames.com] 
Sent: Monday, July 11, 2005 11:39 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com; webmaster@gamerzplanet.net
Cc: Jeff Morris
Subject: Massive Number of DMCA Violations on www.Gamerzplanet.net
Importance: High



While I appreciate the quick turn around in removing the violating files, I
must wonder how many violations it
